float GetAverage ( float  arr[],
int  n

This function calculates the mean value of a image array.

Parameters:
arr[] is the image
n is the number of pixels in the image

{
        int i=0;
        float avg=0;

        for(i=0;i<n;i++){
                avg+=arr[i]/n;
        }
        return avg;
